ygData.subject: How bad are heavy weapons? (was waiting for Ester)
ygData.msgSnippet: Oo, 8.5!  Heavy but grats on the well-balanced :) I suppose I m just biased, I ve always tried to find the lightest weapons I can.  My heaviest 1hslash is my
ygData.messageBody:
Oo, 8.5! Heavy but grats on the well-balanced :)
I suppose I'm just biased, I've always tried to find the lightest
weapons I can. My heaviest 1hslash is my Ebon Razor (4.5) down to my
lightest 0.0 Whip of Strangulation. Tho, at a relatively slow 29 (for
1hslash) I guess 8 wt isn't too bad. It must hurt with the zippyness
of the well-balanced.

Ninev Rudeflute
38.5 and suffering a charisma vs melee crisis
E'ci

Say, aren't you on E'ci too?

--- "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...> wrote:
> Considering my well-balanced scimitar (yech!) is 8.5 lbs, I'd love to
> find one. I haven't had a decent 1HS weapon in ages.
>
> Kit
>

>

> 8.0! I lose it all with an ebw(primary) and an ebm(off) when
